discription: Individuals seeking lifelong coverage, especially for purposes such as providing for dependents, estate planning, or leaving a legacy, may find a whole life guaranteed plan well-suited.

Individuals with long-term financial goals, such as funding education, building wealth, or ensuring financial security during retirement, may find a whole life guaranteed plan aligns with their extended time horizon.
For estate planning purposes, where individuals want to ensure liquidity to cover potential estate taxes or provide an inheritance to heirs, a whole life guaranteed plan can be beneficial.
Whole life plan can be a source of supplemental income during retirement. Policy loans or withdrawals can provide a tax-advantaged income stream.
